# Fire
[![Built by Blazed Labs "Built by Blazed Labs"](https://img.shields.io/badge/Built%20By-Blazed%20Labs-red?logo=data:image/webp;base64,)](https://blazedlabs.com/)

Next-gen front-end tooling for blazing fast websites.

[View Demo](https://fire-core.netlify.app/)

## Development
- Clone the Repository
- Install NPM dependencies
```shell
npm install
```
- Start dev server
```shell
npm run dev
```
- Navigate to http://localhost:3000
